caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. JOSEPH MICHAEL STROHL,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 806 MAL 2002, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text:
AND NOW, this 13th day of February 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby Denied.
Justice LAMB did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
